LanguageData.BDFV_CapacitorTip: The internal capacitor of this vehicle that stores power from reactor. Some weapons or subsystems require capacitor charge to function.
LanguageData.BDFV_EMPresist: EMP resist: EMP damage below {0} will not break the shield
LanguageData.WhippleShieldDesc:
The whipple shield is an high tech defense system that can completely neutralize a single attack above its absorb threshold, consuming one charge in the process, while letting lesser damages pass through. Maintaining the shield requires constant power from capacitor, and recharging will drain extra power in the process. EMP attacks will shut down the shield, while explosions can easily break multiple layers.

Clicking on this gizmo will toggle the shield.
LanguageData.WhippleShieldLayers: Shield capacity: {0} charges\n({2} shield system integrity)
LanguageData.AblativeShieldDesc:
The Ablative shield is an high tech defense system that works much like a normal personal shield, neutralizing damage while consuming charge equivalent of the damage amount. Maintaining the shield requires constant power from capacitor, and recharging will drain extra power in the process. EMP attacks will shut down the shield.

Clicking on this gizmo will toggle the shield.
LanguageData.AblativeShieldCapacity: Shield capacity: {0} HP\n({2} shield system integrity)
LanguageData.AblativeShieldRechargeDelay: Recharge delay after taking damage: {0} second
LanguageData.AblativeShieldRegenInitPct: Initial charge when regen from breaking: {0}
LanguageData.ECSShieldDesc:
The ECS shield is an high tech defense system that completely nullify damages below its damage threshold, without any additional strain on power grid apart from maintenance power. But any damage above the threshold will break the shield. Attacks will cause stress that reduces threshold until a certain minimal value, while stress will dissipate on its own, regardless whether the shield is on or off, under attack or destroyed. EMP attacks will shut down the shield. ECS shields are exceptional at stopping explosions and have a much higher threshold against them.

Clicking on this gizmo will toggle the shield.
LanguageData.ECSShieldStressCapacity: Stress capacity: {0} HP\n({2} shield system integrity)
LanguageData.DeflectShieldDesc:
The deflector shield is an vehicle mounted variant of burn-out shield, completely nullify any damage except EMP for the duration of activation. Constantly consumes power when activated or recharging

Clicking on this gizmo will activate the shield.
LanguageData.DeflectShieldDuration: Shield duration: {0} second\n({2} shield system integrity)
LanguageData.DeflectShieldKeepCharge: This shield retains its charge when turned off.
LanguageData.BDFV_ReactorOutOfFuel: {0}'s reactor has ran out of fuel!
LanguageData.BDFV_ReactorDesc: Toggles this vehicle's reactor. Reactor will turn on automatically when vehicle is drafted. This vehicle's reactor generates {0} power per second while consuming {1} fuel.
